The current schedule for the Neural Network reading group is


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# All available members
# members <- c(

#   "Mingxuan Yi",

#   "Patrick Rubin-Delanchy", 
#   "Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot", 
#   "Robert Allison",
#   "Sam Tickle", 
#   "Song Liu"
# )
# Members
members = c(
"Alexander Modell","Andi Wang","Andrea Becsek","Andrew Jones","Anthony Lee",
"Chang Zhang","Christophe Andrieu","Hamza Alawiye","Henry Reeve", "Ian Gallagher", 
"Jennifer Chakravarty","Mark Beaumont","Mauro Camara Escudero","Mingxuan Yi","Nick Whiteley",
"Patrick Rubin-Delanchy","Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot","Robert Allison","Sam Power", "Sam Tickle",
"Song Liu", "Tjun Yee Hoh")
status =     c("PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", 
               "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR",
               "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", 
               "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
               "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR")
presenting_members <- members[ifelse(status == "PRESENTER", T, F)]
# Date of Presentation
dates_tb1 <- seq(as.Date("2020-10-19"), as.Date("2020-12-14"), by="weeks")
dates_tb2 <- seq(as.Date("2021-02-01"), as.Date("2021-03-08"), by="weeks")
dates     <- c(dates_tb1, dates_tb2)
# Order of Presentations
index     <- c(5, 8, 15, 11, 7, 
               9, 6, 2, 4, 14, 
               10, 3, 1, 12, 13)
names <- presenting_members[index]
# ZOOM during COVID
location <- rep("ZOOM", length(names))
schedule <- data.frame(Date=dates,Name=names, Room=location)
# upcoming WEEK
monday = "2020-11-30"
knitr::kable(schedule) %>% 
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive")) %>% 
    row_spec(which(schedule$Date == monday), bold=F, color="white", background="#0066ff")
```
